DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional , prospective , longitudinal cohort study . A total 150 pediatric subject glaucoma elevate intraocular pressure , include 75 latanoprost-treated subject 75 non-topical prostaglandin analogue treat subject , enrol ophthalmic hospital clinic academic ophthalmic center . As non-interventional study , study subject ' continue use latanoprost assessment ocular event obtain routine medical follow-up treating ophthalmologist designate member medical care team .
DOC.detailed_description: At least 40 subject follow age group : 1- < 5 year 5- < 18 year . No minimum required number < 1 year age group .
DOC.criteria: Male female < 18 year age ( neonate must least 36 week gestational age ) . Diagnosis pediatric glaucoma elevate intraocular pressure . Evidence personally sign date informed consent document indicate subject ( and/or legally acceptable representative ) inform pertinent aspect study . A signed dated assent require applicable accord local law . For treated subject : Continuously treat latanoprost least 1 month within year prior baseline examination . For untreated subject : Continuously treat latanoprost topical prostaglandin analogue less one month prior baseline examination ( base best knowledge treat ophthalmologist ) , unlikely treat latanoprost topical prostaglandin analogue threeyear study period ; OR No prior treatment latanoprost topical prostaglandin analogue , unlikely treat latanoprost topical prostaglandin analogue threeyear study period . Unable/unwilling comply protocol . Pregnant nursing female baseline . For treated subject : history allergy hypersensitivity ingredient contain latanoprost ( e.g. , hypersensitivity benzalkonium chloride ) .
